name: smelling-salts
effect: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is paralyzed, this move has double power, and the target is cured of its paralysis.
short_effect: If the target is paralyzed, inflicts double damage and cures the paralysis.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: Powerful against paralyzed foes, but also heals them.
flavor_text.emerald: Powerful against paralyzed foes, but also heals them.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: Doubly effective on a paralyzed foe, but it also cures the foeâ€™s paralysis.
